snippet: Apple is in talks to buy Chinese software maker Handseeing, an executive at the Chinese company said Friday, a deal that would mark the iPhone maker’s first acquisition in the country.
abstract: Apple is in talks to buy Chinese software maker Handseeing, an executive at the Chinese company said Friday, a deal that would mark the iPhone maker’s first acquisition in the country.

headline.main: Apple Said to Eye Chinese Software Maker

snippet: The research chief for Nokia says the company will not follow Apple into customized chips as it places its research bets.
abstract: The research chief for Nokia says the company will not follow Apple into customized chips as it places its research bets.

headline.main: Nokia Declines to Go All In on Chips

snippet: Some New York City hotels are trying to leverage real or imagined connections with popular shows.

headline.main: New York Hotels Entice Customers With Lure of TV Life
headline.print_headline: New York Hotels Entice Customers With Lure of TV Life

snippet: Are electronics so breakable because they were never intended to last very long anyway?
abstract: Are electronics so breakable because they were never intended to last very long anyway?

headline.main: Electronics Designers Struggle With Form, Function and Obsolescence
